ResponseRules.description: Kind of an irreverent asshole, jokester. Irritated at Igwe for fucking shit up with the aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: OnUse, Guard Duty
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Approach, Combat Over
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: OnUsed, Ready for Combat
ResponseRule.description: Security is bracing for an imminent battle with alien forces. They have been holed up in a safe place, but the time has come to fight the aliens

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: OnUse, Combat Over
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Mourning Sarah
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Loiter, Combat Over
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: OnUsed, Elevator Power On
Austin Cool: Player Uses Alien Power
Austin Cool: OnUse, Waiting on Turrets
Austin Cool: Loiter, Player Opened Door Early
Austin Cool: OnUse, Mika Not Rescued Yet
Austin Cool: Transcribe (Fabricator)
ResponseRule.description: Austin is in the rear of the controlled space that the security guards hold. He can see aliens stalking around but is safely out of reach on an overhead catwalk. He reports that tehre is a fabricator they could use to make equipment and supplies, but an explosion has knocked out power in the area. At the end he is told to signal the player and show him where to go when he arrives.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: On Catwalks Overhead
ResponseRule.description: He is patrolling a catwalk safely out of reach of the creepy aliens in this area. When the player arrives across the room Austin signals him and calls out, urging him to make his way up to that catwalk and safety.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: On Catwalks Overhead (Igwe Alive)
ResponseRule.description: He is patrolling a catwalk safely out of reach of the creepy aliens in this area. When the player arrives across the room Austin signals him and calls out, urging him to make his way up to that catwalk and safety. He explains that the area is hazardous now because a scientist ran through and attracted the attention of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Points Up To Catwalks
ResponseRule.description: Austin is now safely behind the locked door, looking at the player through a small window. He has already told the player once to go up top to the suspended catwalk to get in. He can't open this door because of the chance of an alien getting in.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Opens Door if Aliens Dead
ResponseRule.description: Austin was looking through a tiny window in a door that was keeping aliens out of his makeshift fortress. If the player kills them all Austin opens the door for him.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Give Back Door Key
ResponseRule.description: He was holding the key to the back door, protecting the rear of thier makeshift fortress from aliens. If the player kills all the aliens back there Austin gives him the key, allowing him to come and go at will.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: OnUse, Points to Sarah
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Suffocating
ResponseRule.description: Austin is now safely behind the locked door, looking at the player through a small window. He has already told the player once to go up top to the suspended catwalk to get in. He can't open this door because of the chance of an alien getting in.

ResponseRule.name: Austin Cool: Suffocating Over
ResponseRule.description: Austin is now safely behind the locked door, looking at the player through a small window. He has already told the player once to go up top to the suspended catwalk to get in. He can't open this door because of the chance of an alien getting in.
